meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or excitement.
meanings.sent1: Zowie! That magic trick was amazing!
meanings.sent2: Zowie! I can't believe we won the game!
meanings.sent3: Zowie! The cat just did a backflip!
meanings.sent4: Zowie! The fireworks lit up the night sky like a rainbow!
meanings.sent5: Zowie! The surprise party was a blast!

meanings.definition: A sudden loud noise or exclamation.
meanings.sent1: The zowie of the fireworks startled the birds.
meanings.sent2: I heard a loud zowie coming from the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The zowie of the thunder made me jump.
meanings.sent4: The zowie of the car horn echoed through the street.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected zowie of the door slamming made me spill my drink.
